Text:
Not a dvd rip.  It's a re-encode of the TiMPE release, which was a re-encode of the 720p itunes webscr.  

Plus it's 700mb rip with AC3 so the video has an extremely low bitrate so it looks grainy and washed out.

This release truly does not look good, download at your own peril
Re-encoders should mention their source it in the description. Keeps ppl from wasting their bandwidth. Unless the source isn't a BluRay rip, it's usually not worth downloading.
its because ppl use 6 channel audio straight off the dvd on a 1cd size
